alert.note: Alert for Centre; Clinton (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 2:45PM EDT until August 04 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CENTRE AND SOUTHEASTERN CLINTON COUNTIES... At 245 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Castanea, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Lock Haven, Carroll, Woodward, Lamar, Mill Hall, Dunnstown, Flemington, Castanea, Blanchard, Rebersburg, Mackeyville and Beech Creek. For those driving on Interstate 80, this includes areas between the Bellefonte and Mile Run exits, specifically from mile markers 171 to 195. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
